name: Repaint
long_description: Repaint lets you build a website by chatting in plain English. As you describe your business and the changes you want, Repaint turns those messages into design, layout, and content on a live site. It’s built for small businesses, independent professionals, and anyone who doesn’t want to deal with code or heavy design tools. Our vision is to make a new type of software creation that's accessible to everyone.
one_liner: Build a website by chatting with AI
